metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 22 (2002) - PICES Science : the First Ten Years and a Look to the Future / edited by R. Ian Perry, Patricia Livingston, and Alexander S. Bychkov
metadata.description:
This report provides eight papers that were presented during the symposium.  The symposium reviewed the history and major accomplishments of the PICES scientific committees.

[ LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.22.  ISBN 0973149221 ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To report results from PICES symposium held on October 8, 2001 in Victoria, Canada.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Acknowledgement of source publication required.
